title: FallenSoldier
author: FallenSoldier
content: We are starting a community for traders, crypto/NFT enthusiasts where you also have pro traders that mentor you and teach you the way to trade and the risk managements strategies. If you're not interested in learning but still want a pro to trade for you, you can allocate an amount to a pro trader and he will trade for you.What do you get by being a Fallen Apes?Investment Pool: Join a Pro Trader pool with your Staking RewardsTrading Classes/Mentor, Giveways & Free $FAPA Private Community With Alpha, Traders & Crypto ConnoisseursStake your NFT & Earn 10-30% APY in USDtThere is a cap on how much you can allocate to a trader for each NFT, and by staking your NFT you earn USDt, which you can add to an investment pool and earn a higher yield.This is not a ponzi and we only have 10k NFTs available, we wouldn't be able to train and take care of a bigger community and so we made the decision to only have 10k members. One of our trader started a 1k to 10k challenge in 20 days challenge, where he document his journey on twitter ( Entry, when he close and daily update )Day 11 update : https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1560339398050414593Follow us on twitter : https://twitter.com/FallenApesNFTWebsite : https://www.fallenapes.com/Discord : https://discord.gg/araeE4U4

comments.author: Articlepro
comments.created_time: August 20, 2022, 10:33:30 PMLast edit: August 20, 2022, 11:03:42 PM by Articlepro
comments.body: Liked the utility of the nft! there are a lot of nfts being launched nowadays with no utility but this one seems to be really good!

comments.author: FallenSoldier
